venue.name: Scibelli Enterprise Center, Across from STCC, downstairs media room

item.description:
Since we do not have requests for a closed-door, members-only presentations, we will have an open-door meeting instead.

We are going to have a representative from a CDK Creative Play marketing company present.

Our presenter's bio:

Puzzled about a project? Karen has an MBA in Marketing from Temple University and over 15 yearsâ€™ of marketing experience in toys, games, arts & crafts, and puzzles. Her passion for uncovering critical consumer insights and trends to build brand strategies has fueled the creation of dozens of amazing new product experiences and innovative marketing plans. Karen's attention to detail and her commitment to get the job done right are cornerstones of the CDK Creative Play experience.
item.name: PUBLIC OPEN DOOR November meeting - CDK Creative Play
